title: Are GMOs Safe?
subtle:
Pro/Con (nonfiction), 1,925 words, Level Z1 (Grade 5+), Lexile 1240L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     Z and Z2
description: People have been eating foods grown from genetically engineered seed for only the past two decades. While hundreds of published reports have explored the benefits and risks of GMO foods, many people strongly believe GMOs are unsafe for human consumption. Are GMOs Safe? provides students with a detailed look at the pros and cons of genetically modified foods in the agricultural industry. The book can also be used to teach students how to distinguish between fact and opinion and the proper use of commas in a series. The book and lesson are also available for levels Z and Z2.
